about_the_game:
You found yourself on Ehko, a remote Island primarily inhabited by former fashion models, influencers, and dancers—island girls who are naturally sculpted, their skin bronzed by the sun and seas, their legs long and toned, and their feet deliciously perfect.

The men? They’ve traded in real women for AI-generated girlfriends—obedient replicas who cater to their every desire without question or the need for consent. AI has also automated nearly every job on Ehko, leaving the population few paths to success or fulfillment of their dreams. But the last straw for you was the new OnlyAI law, which made it illegal to shoot photographs, allowing only AI-generated images to stop face-swapping, catfishing, and other forms of identity theft.

Somehow, only you saw what this really was—AI slowly erasing real connection, numbing everyone’s senses, and crushing ambition. Only you understood it was the beginning of a silent apocalypse—the quiet, inevitable end of human desire and expression.

As a photographer, you know the power of true art. It has the ability to reflect who we are, confront what we’ve become, and envision what we could be. This led you to believe capturing the rawest, most honest photographic art, could spark a revolution that would wake people from their AI-induced slumber. 

Your quest, should you choose to accept it, is to seek out the most intoxicating women on Ehko…. seduce them into moments of honesty and intimacy… and capture the visual pulse of their beauty and lust in art... to save the world.

Gameplay:

  • Ehko Island is a Kinetic Visual Novel: A sub-category of Visual Novels that averts the tradition of having Multiple Endings and instead focuses on a singular, linear plot.

  • You navigate through an interactive map of the island, unlocking 32 scenes and over 2000 renders.

  • A seductive female narrator will guide you through the experience, reading every line of text directly to you.

  • You have a leg and foot fetish that affects what you look at, and how you see the world.

  • You explore the sexual freedom and shared loneliness of the women of Ehko living under the oppressive rule of an AI-obsessed government.

  • You form new relationships with the island’s most intriguing women—while confronting your own inner hangups.

  • And along the way, you’ll catch glimpses of other stories of life on Ehko, in short vignettes, with more to unfold in future DLCs.

content_descriptors.notes: Ehko Island contains explicit nudity, graphic sex scenes, depictions of drug use, and violence.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ehko Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ehko Island is a dystopian sci-fi adult visual novel about an amateur photographer in love with legs and feet, trying to seduce and capture the island’s most intoxicating women to spark a revolution. The story has one path with one ending and does not contain animation.
